Getting Started

# Installation

Everything you need to set up Tremor Raw.

## Framework Guides

Tremor Raw is designed for React 
v18.2.0+ and requires Tailwind CSS v4.0+.

[### Next.js

Full-featured React framework with great developer experience.](/docs/getting-started/installation/next)[### Vite

Updating Soon

Fast and modern development server and build tool.](/docs/getting-started/installation/vite)

  
  

## Further Reading and Resources

### Tremor Blocks

Copy and paste production-ready blocks. Check out [Tremor Blocks](https://blocks.tremor.so).

### Figma UI Kit

Here you'll find all components and styles for building Tremor dashboards in
Figma. Check out 
[Tremor's Figma UI Kit](https://www.figma.com/community/file/1233953507961010067)

### Icons

We love the bold style of [Remix Icon](https://remixicon.com) . It's a large icon set, licensed under Apache License 2.0.
